languages.text: Лорд-капитан, со стыдом сообщаем, что нам не удалось уберечь экипаж Святилища Навигатора. В ходе варп-прыжка практически весь он был затронут чудовищными искажениями, о которых мы не решаемся сообщать. Старшие офицеры заступили на последнюю вахту, мы здесь о000дни, всех подчин11енных мы оделили милостью сНЕНАДОмерти. Шлюзы заблокированы, ибо эхо нашей боли велико и сведет с ума всякого непосвященного. Ведите нас туда, куда пожелаете — хоть вперед, к Порту СтрАШНОанник, хоть назад. Мы будем служить и направлять корабль, сколько сможем.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, со стыдом сообщаем, что нам не удалось уберечь экипаж навигационной палубы. В ходе варп-прыжка практически весь он был затронут чудовищными искажениями, о которых мы не решаемся сообщать. Старшие офицеры заступили на последнюю вахту, мы здесь о000дни, всех подчин11енных мы оделили милостью сНЕНАДОмерти. Шлюзы заблокированы, ибо эхо нашей боли велико и сведет с ума всякого непосвященного. Ведите нас туда, куда пожелаете — хоть вперед, к Порту СтрАШНОанник, хоть назад. Мы будем служить и направлять корабль, сколько сможем.

languages.text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан, со стыдом сообщаем, что нам не удалось уберечь экипаж Святилища Навигатора. В ходе варп-прыжка практически весь он был затронут чудовищными искажениями, о которых мы не решаемся сообщать. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

languages.text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, muy a nuestro pesar no hemos podido proteger a la tripulación del sanctum de navegantes. Durante el salto de disformidad, prácticamente toda la tripulación ha sido afectada por deformidades monstruosas que no podemos relatar. Los oficiales superiores empezamos el último turno de guardia y nos quedamos sol000s, dando a los tripulantes más jóvenes una muerte piadESPANTosa. Sellamos las esclusas para que nuestros gritos de dolor no enloquecieran a los no iniciados. Guíenos adónde quiera, ya sea hacia delante, a Puerto VagabuNOOOdo, o hacia atrás. Le serviremos y guiaremos la nave mientras podamos.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

traits.locale_text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, muy a nuestro pesar no hemos podido proteger a la tripulación del sanctum de navegantes. Durante el salto de disformidad, prácticamente toda la tripulación ha sido afectada por deformidades monstruosas que no podemos relatar. Los oficiales superiores empezamos el último turno de guardia y nos quedamos sol000s, dando a los tripulantes más jóvenes una muerte piadESPANTosa. Sellamos las esclusas para que nuestros gritos de dolor no enloquecieran a los no iniciados. Guíenos adónde quiera, ya sea hacia delante, a Puerto VagabuNOOOdo, o hacia atrás. Le serviremos y guiaremos la nave mientras podamos.

languages.text: 舰长大人，我们很惭愧地告知您，我们未能保护好导航者圣所的船员。在亚空间跳跃的过程中，几乎所有船员都遭受了可怕的畸变，具体情况我们简直不忍描述。所有的高级军官都开始进行最后一次值班，我们孤无无无立无无无援，我们已经让所有低阶船员得到了死@J恐?ㄞ懼u*&亡的解脱。我们闭锁了气闸，因为我们痛苦的回声，足以让那些一无所知的人们陷入疯狂。您想去哪里，就带我们去哪里吧。前进到漫嫑嫑嫑游港也好，返回也好。只要我们一息尚存，就会一直为这艘船效力、掌舵。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人，我们很惭愧地告知您，我们未能保护好导航者圣所的船员。在亚空间跳跃的过程中，几乎所有船员都遭受了可怕的畸变，具体情况我们简直不忍描述。所有的高级军官都开始进行最后一次值班，我们孤无无无立无无无援，我们已经让所有低阶船员得到了死@J恐?ㄞ懼u*&亡的解脱。我们闭锁了气闸，因为我们痛苦的回声，足以让那些一无所知的人们陷入疯狂。您想去哪里，就带我们去哪里吧。前进到漫嫑嫑嫑游港也好，返回也好。只要我们一息尚存，就会一直为这艘船效力、掌舵。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン、不名誉なことですが、航宙士のサンクトゥムのクルーを守れなかったことを報告します。ワープジャンプ中、ほとんどすべてのクルーが恐ろしい歪みに苦しめられたものの、それについて私達から語ることはできません。上級士官達は最後の見張りを開始し、私達はこここ孤独に残され、下級クルーにやややすらかな死を与えました。私達の痛みが残響が未熟な者たちを狂わせてしまったため、エアロックを封鎖しました。私達をお導きください―ポート・ワンダーまで向かうのか、それとも戻るのか。私達はできる限り船を操り、お仕えいたします。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン、不名誉なことですが、航宙士のサンクトゥムのクルーを守れなかったことを報告します。ワープジャンプ中、ほとんどすべてのクルーが恐ろしい歪みに苦しめられたものの、それについて私達から語ることはできません。上級士官達は最後の見張りを開始し、私達はこここ孤独に残され、下級クルーにやややすらかな死を与えました。私達の痛みが残響が未熟な者たちを狂わせてしまったため、エアロックを封鎖しました。私達をお導きください―ポート・ワンダーまで向かうのか、それとも戻るのか。私達はできる限り船を操り、お仕えいたします。

languages.text: Herr Kapitän, wir berichten, dass wir es zu unserer Schande versäumt haben, die Besatzung der Navigator's Sanctum zu schützen. Während des Warpsprungs wurde praktisch die gesamte Besatzung von monströsen Verformungen heimgesucht, die wir nicht zu beschreiben vermögen. Die leitenden Offiziere begannen die letzte Wache, wir waren schon da, wir überließen die gesamte junge Besatzung der Gnade von dFeaRth. Wir versiegelten die Luftschleusen, denn das Echo unseres Schmerzes war groß genug, um die Uneingeweihten in den Wahnsinn zu treiben. Führt uns, wohin Ihr wollt — weiter nach Port WanDONTer oder zurück. Wir werden dem Schiff dienen und es lenken, solange wir können.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

languages.text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous rapportons que, à notre grande honte, nous n'avons pas réussi à protéger les membres d'équipage du sanctum de navigation. Durant le saut Warp, la totalité de l'équipage s'est vue affligée de déformations monstrueuses, que nous ne pouvons nous résoudre à détailler. Les officiers supérieurs ont commencé leur dernier quart. Nous étions l111ivrés à n00us-mêmes, et avons offert aux plus jeunes la miséricorde de la moPEUrt Nous avons scellé les sas, car le simple écho de notre douleur était assez puissant pour pousser les non-initiés à la folie. Menez-nous où bon vous semble... plus avant en directiNON de Port l'Errance, ou sur nos pas. Nous servirons et gouvernerons le vaisseau aussi longtemps que nous le pourrons.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

Menez-nous où bon vous semble... plus avant en directiNON de Port l'Errance, ou sur nos pas. Nous servirons et gouvernerons le vaisseau aussi longtemps que nous le pourrons.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, utançla belirtirim ki Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndaki mürettebatın emniyetini sağlayamadık. Öte sıçrama sırasında neredeyse bütün mürettebat korkunç deformasyonlara uğradı, zayiat sayımı yapacak gücü kendimizde bulamadık. Kıdemli subaylar s000n nöbete başladı. Burada kendi başımızaydık, kıdemsiz tayfalara merhametli bir ölKORKUüm armağan ettik. Hava kilitlerini kapadık çünkü acımızın yankıları, deneyimsizleri deliliğe sürüklemeye yeterdi. Bizi dilediğiniz yere götürün. İster UzYAPMAak Liman'a, isterseniz de geriye. Elimiz ayağımız tuttukça hizmet edecek ve gemiyi hareket hâlinde tutacağız.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we report that, to our disgrace, we failed to safeguard the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum. During the warp jump, virtually the entire crew was afflicted with monstrous deformations, which we cannot bring ourselves to recount. The senior officers began the last watch, we were here al000ne, we gave all the junior crew the mercy of dFeaRth. We sealed the airlocks, as the echoes of our pain were great enough to drive the uninitiated to madness. Lead us where you will — onward to Port WanDONTer, or back. We will serve and steer the ship as long as we can.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, utanarak söylemem gerekiyor ki Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndaki mürettebatın güvenliğini sağlamayı başaramadık. Öte sıçrama sırasında neredeyse bütün mürettebat canavarımsı deformasyonlara uğradı, zayiat sayımı yapacak gücü kendimizde bulamadık. Kıdemli subaylar s000n nöbete başladı. Burada kendi başımızaydık, tecrübesiz tayfalara merhametli bir öKlüORKUm armağan ettik. Hava kilitlerini kapadık çünkü acımızın yankıları, tecrübesiz olanlarımızı deliliğe sürüklemek için yeterliydi. Bizi dilediğiniz yere yöneltin. İster UzYAPMAak Liman'a, isterseniz de geriye. Hizmet etmeyi sürdürecek ve gemiyi elimizden geldiğince hareket hâlinde tutacağız.
